unit.name: Marshal
unit.description: Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Orders, Plate Armour

unit.name: Knight Commander
unit.description: single model, Height see mount, Type Cavalry, Base see mount, First Knight, Plate Armour

unit.name: Wizard
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm

unit.name: Prelate
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Blessings, Channel (1), Heavy Armour, Divine Attacks

unit.name: Artificer
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Engineer (3+), Master Artificer, Light Armour

unit.name: Inquisitor
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Fearless, Not a Leader, Plate Armour, Lethal Strike, Multiple Wounds (D3)

unit.name: Heavy Infantry
unit.description: 20-50 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Parent Unit (If starting size is 21 or more models), Scoring, Support Unit (If starting size is 20 models)

unit.name: Light Infantry
unit.description: 10-20 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Scoring, Support Unit

unit.name: State Militia
unit.description: 10-25 models. 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Light Troops, Reserves, Bow (4+), Paired Weapons, Pistol (4+)

unit.name: Electoral Cavalry
unit.description: 5-15 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Scoring, Plate Armour, Horse: Harnessed

unit.name: Imperial Guard
unit.description: 15-40 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Bodyguard, Parent Unit, Scoring, Plate Armour

unit.name: Knights of the Sun Griffon
unit.description: 3-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x75 mm, Fear, Scoring, Plate Armour, Shield, Young Griffon: Harnessed

unit.name: Arcane Engine
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Channel (1), Swiftstride, Towering Presence, Horse (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate

unit.name: Imperial Rangers
unit.description: 5-10 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Frontiersmen, Light Troops, Scout, Skirmisher, Hard Target (1), Beast Hunters, Bow (4+)

unit.name: Reiters
unit.description: 5-10 models, 0-3 Units/Army, 0-20 Models/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Feigned Flight, Light Troops, Vanguard, Light Armour, Reiter: Fire on Impact, Horse: Harnessed

unit.name: Imperial Rocketeer
unit.description: Imperial Rocketeer (4+), single model, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base 60 mm round, War Machine, Move or Fire

unit.name: Mortar
unit.description: Mortar (4+), single model, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base 60 mm round, War Machine, Move or Fire

unit.name: Volley Gun
unit.description: Volley Gun (4+), single model, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base 60 mm round, War Machine, Move or Fire

unit.name: Cannon
unit.description: Cannon (4+), single model, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base 60 mm round, War Machine, Move or Fire

unit.name: Flagellants
unit.description: 15-30 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Fanatical, Fearless, Frenzy, Unbreakable, Zealots, Battle Focus, Great Weapon

unit.name: Steam Tank
unit.description: single model, 0-1 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Fear, Fearless, Random Movement (4D3"), Steam Powered, Towering Presence, Unbreakable, Chassis: Breath Attack (Str 2, AP 3), Grind Attacks (3D3), Steam Cannon (3+), Steel Ram: Impact Hits (2D3), Inanimate

mount.name: Horse
Horse and Light Troops
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Harnessed

mount.name: Pegasus
mount.description: Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 40*40 mm, Harnessed, Fly (8", 16"), Light Troops

mount.name: Young Griffon
mount.description: Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x75 mm, Fear, Harnessed

mount.name: Great Griffon
mount.description: Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x100 mm, Fear, Fly (8", 16"), Light Troops, Towering Presence, Harnessed

mount.name: Dragon
mount.description: Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Fly (7", 14"), Light Troops, Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks), Harnessed

mount.name: Altar of Battle
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Holy Relic, Stubborn, Swiftstride, Towering Presence, Aegis (4+), Horse (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate

mount.name: Arcane Engine
mount.description: Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Channel (1), Swiftstride, Towering Presence, Horse (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate

item.name: Arcane Shield
item.description: Universal Rule. Friendly units within 6" of the model gain Distracting. The model can cast Perception of Strength (Cosmology) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

item.name: Banner of Unity
item.description: Parent Units only. Whenever the bearers unit is targeted by an Order, an additional Order can be given (for free) to a single Support Unit within 8" of the bearers unit.

item.name: Beast Hunters
item.description: Attack Attribute-Shooting. When using a Bow, the Shooting Attack gains Lethal Strike (against Beast) and Shots 2.

item.name: Blacksteel
item.description: Enchantment: Plate Armour. The wearer gains +1 Armour and Fear. If taken by a model on foot, the wearer gains an additional +1 Armour.

item.name: Blessed Steel
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. The model part gains +2 Agility. Close Combat Attacks made by the model part gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Brace of Pistols
Brace of Pistols (4+)
Brace of Pistols (3+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon, Range 12", Shots 2, Str 4, AP 2, Quick to Fire. Counts as Paired Weapons in close combat.

item.name: Cannon
item.description: This Artillery Weapon can be fired in two ways: - Cannon, Range 72", Shots 1, Str 4 [10], AP 0 [10], [Multiple Wounds (D3+1, Clipped Wings)], Area Attack (1x5) - Volley Gun, Range 12", Shots 2D6, Str 4, AP 4

item.name: Cavalry Pick
item.description: Close Combat Weapon, Attacks made with this weapon gain +2 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Death Warrant
item.description: Enchantment: Hand Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain Battle Focus and become Magical Attacks. If a hit is scored with it against an enemy unit, friendly models with Parent Unit or Support Unit gain Battle Focus with attacks allocated towards the same enemy unit in the same phase in subsequent Initiative Steps.

item.name: Exemplars Flame
item.description: Dominant. Wizards only. Choose a single Parent Unit after Spell Selection (at step 8 of the Pre-Game Sequence). At the start of any friendly Melee Phase, if the bearer is within 18" of the chosen unit, the owner may choose to discard a single Veil Token from their Veil Token pool to grant all R&F models in the chosen unit Lethal Strike and Magical Attacks until the end of the phase.

item.name: Fanatical
item.description: Universal Rule. When a model with Fanatical is killed by a Melee Attack during any Initiative Step of a Round of Combat it is fighting, remove it as a casualty only at the end of Initiative Step 0.

item.name: Fire on Impact
item.description: Attack Attribute-Close Combat. A Charging model part with Fire on Impact! using a Pistol, a Brace of Pistols, or a Repeater Pistol always strikes at Initiative Step 10, and the Strength of its Close Combat Attacks is set to 4 and their Armour Penetration is set to 2 (regardless of the users Agility, Strength, and Armour Penetration).

item.name: First Knight
item.description: Universal Rule. When the model is joined to a unit of Knightly Orders, the unit gains Fearless, and if the model is the General, the R&F models in the unit also gain Parent Unit.

item.name: Foresight
item.description: Universal Rule. Friendly units within 6" of the model gain Lightning Reflexes. The model can cast Ice and Fire (Cosmology) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

item.name: Frontiersmen
item.description: Universal Rule. The model automatically passes Panic Tests caused by Terror.

item.name: Great Tactician
item.description: Universal Rule. The model may give two Orders per turn instead of one.

item.name: Hammer of Witches
item.description: Enchantment: Hand Weapon. The bearers Attack Value is set to 5 when using this weapon, and attacks made with it gain Battle Focus (against Channel) and become Magical Attacks.

item.name: Holy Relic
item.description: Universal. Friendly units within 6" of the bearer gain Hatred. Model parts with Harnessed are not affected. For Bound Spells from Blessings cast by the rider, Type Casters Unit is replaced with Type: 6" Aura. The model can cast Unerring Strike (Divination) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

item.name: Household Standard
item.description: If the General is part of the bearers unit, its Commanding Presence range is increased by 6".

item.name: Imperial Prince
item.description: Universal Rule. The model part gains +1 Attack Value, is equipped with a Hand Weapon enchanted with The Light of Sonnstahl, and may only take up to 50 pts of Special Items.

item.name: Imperial Rocketeer
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Catapult (1x1), Range 15-48", Shots 3, Str 5, AP 3, Multiple Wounds (D3). This weapon treats all results on the Misfire Table as Malfunction (each shot can cause a Misfire).

item.name: Imperial Seal
item.description: Models on foot only. Enchantment: Plate Armour. The wearer gains +3 Armour and +1 Discipline. The wearers unit cannot voluntarily declare Flee as a Charge Reaction.

item.name: Irregulars
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Hard Target (1), Light Troops, and Skirmisher.

item.name: Karadons Courser
item.description: Knight Commanders mounted on Horse and Marshals mounted on Horse only. One use only. May be activated at the start of any friendly Player Turn. For the duration of this Player Turn, friendly units within 6" of the bearer must reroll failed Charge Range rolls.

item.name: Knightly Orders
Knightly Orders (Knight Commander)
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains +1 Defensive Skill, and the Knight gains +1 Offensive Skill, +1 Strength, and +1 Armour Penetration. Knightly Orders cannot take Great Weapons.

item.name: Locket of Sunna
item.description: When fighting a Duel, choose a single model part with neither Harnessed nor Inanimate that the bearer is fighting with. The bearer and the chosen model part must swap their Characteristic values of Strength, Armour Penetration, Resilience, Agility, and Attack Value. This is done before applying other modifiers. If the chosen model part does not have a Defensive Profile of its own, use the combined models Defensive Profile instead.

item.name: Long Rifle
Long Rifle (3+)
Champ: Long Rifle (3+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon, Range 48", Shots 1, Str 5, AP 3, Multiple Wounds (2, against Standard), Unwieldy.

item.name: Mantle of Ullor
item.description: Enemy units within 6" of the bearer do not gain +1 Agility for Charging Momentum.

item.name: Marksmans Pennant
item.description: The bearers unit does not suffer the -1 to-hit modifier for Stand and Shoot Charge Reactions.

item.name: Master Artificer
item.description: Universal Rule. The Master Artificer may give the Order Ready! Aim! Fire! to a Parent Unit or Support Unit it has joined.

item.name: Mortar
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Catapult (6x6), Range 12-48", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 1 [4], [Multiple Wounds (D3)].

item.name: Repeater Gun
Repeater Gun (4+)
Champ: Repeater Gun (4+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon, Range 24", Shots 3, Str 4, AP 2, Unwieldy.

item.name: Repeater Pistol
Repeater Pistol (4+)
Champ: Repeater Pistol (4+)
Repeater Pistol (3+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon, Range 12", Shots 3, Str 4, AP 2, Quick to Fire. If the model is also equipped with a Pistol or a Brace of Pistols, this weapon gains Shots 4.

item.name: Reserves
item.description: The unit is treated as Insignificant by Parent and Support Units.

item.name: Shield of Volund
item.description: Cannot be taken by Gigantic models. Enchantment: Shield. While using this Shield, attacks against the bearers model with Lethal Strike and/or Battle Focus lose these Attack Attributes.

item.name: Silver Shots
item.description: Attack Attribute - Shooting. The attack gains Lethal Strike, Multiple Wounds (D3), and must reroll failed to-wound rolls.

item.name: Steam Cannon
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Cannon, Range 36", Shots 1, Str 3 [7], AP 0 [6], [Multiple Wounds (D3, Clipped Wings)], Area Attack (1x5).

item.name: Steam Powered
item.description: Universal Rule. The model may choose not to move despite having Random Movement, and its Pursuit and Overrun Distance are always 0". Before moving in the Movement Phase, the model may choose to replace its Random Movement (4D3") with Random Movement (5D3") until the end of the Movement Phase. If so, the Steam Cannon cannot be used during this Player Turn.

item.name: The Light of Sonnstahl
The Light of Sonnstahl (Imperial Prince)
item.description: Enchantment: Hand Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon wound automatically, always have Armour Penetration 10, and become Magical Attacks.

item.name: Volley Gun
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Volley Gun, Range 24", Shots 3D6x2, Str 5, AP 3.

item.name: Winter Cloak
item.description: The bearer gains Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks), Aegis (5+), and Distracting. The bearer automatically fails all Fortitude Saves.

item.name: Witchfire Guard
item.description: Enchantment: Shield. The bearer gains Aegis (4+, against Magical Attacks) while using this Shield.

item.name: Zealots
item.description: Universal Rule. Prelates may join the unit and gain Fearless and Unbreakable while joined to the unit.
